text: Phira isa tōṁ bā'ada tuhāḍē dila saḵẖata hōṁ ga'ē. Aḵẖīra uha pathara varagē hō ga'ē jāṁ usa tōṁ vī zi'ādā saḵẖata. Patharāṁ vica kujha ajihē vī hudē hana jinhāṁ cōṁ nahirāṁ phuṭa nikaladī'āṁ hana, kūjha pathara pāṭa jāndē hana atē unhāṁ vicōṁ pāṇī nikala ā'undā hai atē kujha pathara ajihē vī hudē hana jihaṛē alāha dē ḍara nāla ḍiga paindē hana. Atē alāha usa tōṁ anajāṇa nahīṁ hai jō kujha tusīṁ karadē hō
